title: Basir Talayee
text:
Entrepreneur, Founder, Storyteller, and Lifelong Learner 

Get intoxicated with the wine of gratitude. Remember, everything is perfect, yet there is always room for improvement. Observe, learn, and act in the present moment. Breathe, smile, and cherish this moment—it is your life.


As a lifelong learner, my adventures from Afghanistan to China, Qatar, and the USA have been driven by a strong commitment to curiosity, learning, service, innovation, and initiating impactful change.
Equipped with insights from a diverse background in psychology, communication, journalism, marketing, business, cognitive science, epistemology, history, education, theater, Afghan culture, sufism, zen buddhism, and global citizenship, I leverage my knowledge, skills, and real-life experiences to foster a vibrant entrepreneurial and educational ecosystem and serve others.

We all come from unique backgrounds and carry stories that are uniquely ours. Curiosity is my beloved guide, helping me learn, ask better questions, practice courage, compassion, and build connections.





“Connection is why we’re here; it is what gives purpose and meaning to our lives.” – Brené Brown


I’m glad our paths crossed!

title: About
text:
Afghanistan

Born a year before the 9/11 attack in central Afghanistan.
Raised in a multilingual, multicultural, entrepreneurial, and Sufi setting.
Learned courage, service, sales, and resilience from my parents and the streets of Kabul.

title: About
text:
China

The first Afghan high school student in the history of China to attend Keystone Academy, Beijing in 2017. 
Completed grades 10, 11, and 12; immersed in Chinese language and culture, traveled to 7 provinces in China.
COVID-19 Pandemic - Immersed in intuitive cooking and marathon biking.

title: About
text:
Qatar

Majored in Strategic Communication and Journalism, learning about the impact of media and Storytelling
Served as an Admissions Diplomat for Northwestern University in Qatar, representing the university and its brand.
Immerse in Arabic, Middle Eastern culture, and politics and media.

title: About
text:
USA

Taliban took over of Afghanistan, helped with family affairs.
Attended Minneapolis & Macalester College, immerse in American Culture & Politics
Immerse to entrepreneurship experiences: Zia & Priti Fund & MacStartUp.
Immerse in psychology, marketing, branding & curriculum design.
Co-founded EmpowerEdX Foundation, secured $1.2 million in scholarships for Afghan students in 2023.
